price: 53 Voyant le feu de l’Enfer, les criminels seront persuadés d’y être précipités, sans le moindre espoir d’y échapper.
arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waraā al-muj'rimūna al-nāra faẓannū annahum muwāqiʿūhā walam yajidū ʿanhā maṣrifan
